name: Combo Burst
description: Characters cheer you on during gameplay!

popup-enable.name: Enable Combo Burst
popup-enable.description: Enable or disable the Combo Burst animations

popup-volume.name: SFX Volume (%)
popup-volume.description: Volume of the Combo Burst SFX

popup-percent.name: Appear every %
popup-percent.description: The percentage difference needed for a Combo Burst to appear (0%-100%)

sprite-pack.name: Sprite Pack
sprite-pack.description: The sprite pack to use for the pop-up animations

popup-effect.name: Popup Animation
popup-effect.description: The animation effect used for the Combo Burst

popup-endpos.name: Popup Offset (%)
popup-endpos.description:
The final horizontal position of the pop-up relative to the side of the screen. (10%-90%)

<cy>Value of 50% will center the pop-up.</c>

popup-defaultsfx.name: Use default SFX if needed
popup-defaultsfx.description: Use sound effect if a custom sprite doesn't have their own sound effect.

popup-sfxslider.name: Use GD SFX slider
popup-sfxslider.description: Use Geometry Dash's SFX volume slider for the mod. Overwrites the mod's volume setting.

comboburst-settingsbtn.name: Show Settings Button
comboburst-settingsbtn.description: Show a settings button in the Pause menu to access the mod's settings.

popup-random.name: Use Randomizer
popup-random.description: Characters will be randomly picked. If disabled, characters will be shown sequentially.

popup-platformer.name: Show in Platformer
popup-platformer.description: Show Combo Burst animations after every checkpoint in platformer mode.

popup-practice.name: Show in Practice Mode
popup-practice.description: Show Combo Burst animations in practice mode.
